name: CrystalMancer (waifu-x-hunters, Castanha, Subexter)
description:
Synopsis: A long time ago, in a forgotten land, the people would walk around with staffs and robes, displaying their powerful magic around.
 In the realm known as Icarn, sages found a misterious object that fell from space.
A dark crystal, carrying with it, a lot of magical power was taken away for study so that it's content could be useful somehow.
 Years have passed, and three other crystals were found. Each emanating a different energy and showing off a different color.
The four crystals were left in a secure place for study and analisys, but one day, a group stole them.
Four wizards, blinded by power, took each one a crystal, and used it's power to unleash chaos in earth.
More years have passed, and the few humans that survived are now living in shelters, little by little being decimated.
But hope, shined once again, when a fifth crystal came from the heavens, with it's purple color, one last good wizard, took care of it.
With the power of the crystal, Izedor, the wizard, contained the power of the other 4 evil wizards, and also, built a machine.
The machinery was able to transverse through time, enabling the user to go back, in the moments before chaos began.
But if Izedor left to do this quest, he might not be able to stop the evil wizards in the present time.
And so... a new hero showed up in the world, one little girl, who refused to give up, and was willing to go back, and stop the chaos, before it even began. Group Name: Waifu x Hunters Group members:
